mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t3_resmenu (resnum, reskind, price, startdate, menuname, introduce, supply, pickuptime, soldout) VALUES (#{resnum}, #{reskind}, #{price}, NOW() , #{menuname}, #{introduce}, #{supply}, #{pickuptime}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT t.idx, reskind, startdate, enddate, menuname, introduce, price, supply, orderer, pickuptime, resnum, i.picture FROM t3_resmenu t LEFT OUTER JOIN t3_resmenu_img i on t.idx = i.idx WHERE t.idx = #{idx}
